data.quizDescription: Trivia Puzzles Challenge. Can you score 7/10?
data.quizMetaTag: Trivia, Quiz, gk question, iq, general knowledge questions, Maths Puzzles quiz

questions.question: There are a certain number of books on my bookshelf. I took a book which is 6th from the right and 4th from the left. Can you find out the number of books on my shelf?
Lucy has 7 daughters and each of them has a brother. Can you figure out the total number of kids Lucy have?

John is twice as old as his little sister. He is also half as old as their dad. Over a period of 50 years, the age of the sister will become half of their dadâ€™s age. What is the age of the John now?
Amy and Alex can do a work in 4 hours and 12 hours respectively. Amy starts the work at 6 AM and they work alternately for one hour each. When will the work be completed?

100 people standing in a circle in an order 1 to 100. No.1 has a sword. He kills next person (i.e. no. 2) and gives sword to next to next (i.e no.3). All person does the same until only 1 survives. Which number survives at the last?
100 girls were attending a party. 85 of them had a red bag, 75 of them have worn brown shoes, 60 of them came with an umbrella and 90 girls wore a ring. How many girls have had all these four items?
What is the percentage increase in the area of a rectangle, if each of its sides is increased by 20%?
How many times are the hands of a clock at right angle in a day?
A train is running at a speed of 40 km/hr and it crosses a post in 18 seconds. What is the length of the train?
A vendor bought bananas at 6 for a rupee. How many for a rupee must he sell to gain 20%?
